content: French Navy Rescues Sailboat From Pirates One Hostage, 2 Pirates Killed In The Operation (CBS/AP) As U.S. attention was fixed on the hostage situation involving an American captain and Somali pirates, France also had its own high-seas crisis to deal with. Officials said the Navy stormed a French sailboat being held by pirates in the Gulf of Aden, off the coast of Somalia, and that one hostage was killed in the operation. >http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2009/04/10/world/main4935376.shtml?tag=main_home_storiesBySection

content: Needless to say the rescue part has taken lesser place to 'what happened to the hostage' in this tale. Seems he might have been caught in the crossfire. >http://www.google.com/hostednews/ap/article/ALeqM5hPvqTr_AWcOn-W2FAuK6fzmVLfyQD97G87CG0
